Description of incident: Daintree Advisors LLC partners with Aperio Group to invest funds on behalf of its clients. Aperio discovered that two Aperio employee email accounts were compromised in a phishing scam. This resulted in unauthorized access to emails sent to and from those accounts between August 21, 2017, and January 11, 2018. Based on Aperio's review of the emails in question, Aperio discovered that some account names, account numbers, balances, and in some cases, personal email addresses were compromised.
